title: Winner: Problem solving - measurement
brief_description: Animated film which visualizes the concept of measurement and rates. Illustrates the usefulness of constructing scale models to estimate a solution. Demonstrates how to use a calculator to compare data and solve problems.
description: Animated film which visualizes the concept of measurement and rates. Illustrates the usefulness of constructing scale models to estimate a solution. Demonstrates how to use a calculator to compare data and solve problems.
